Description:
COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!Duties and Responsibilities:Interacts with other departments when necessary to provide additional or specialized services for functions, promotions and festivities. 
Carries out repairs and maintenance of domestic hot/cold water system, cooling water systems, storm and sanitary sewer system, irrigation and fountain water systems and swimming pools. 
Attends to repairs or replacement of all bathroom/toilet fixtures in guestrooms, public areas and back of the house areas. 
Carries out fan coil unit services in guestrooms, shops, public areas and offices. 
Cleans all manholes, clearing sewage and storing water line blockages using snake machine or other means as required. 
Repairing and maintaining functional parts of mechanical equipment and machinery, such as pumps, compressors etc. 
Attends to all types of repair and maintenance work on site, including emergency response and planned activities.
Responding to a maintenance request within the contractual service level agreement. 
Ensures that the plant room, workshop and related areas are kept clean and tidy condition. 
Observes prescribed safety standards. Helps maintain safe conditions for self and others. 
Other duties as required. Required to work hours to meet operational needs..Skills
Skills:
Working within engineering or similar environment.
Excellent customer service skills.

Knowledge of materials, methods, and the tools involved in the repair of industrial machinery and equipment or other technical issues.
Knowledge of principles and processes for providing customer and personal services. This includes customer needs assessment, meeting quality standards for services, and evaluation of customer satisfaction.
